backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for users, products, orders, education modules, integrations, and business programs, along with comparison utilities and includes blob storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, related components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and key behavior of multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file configuring metadata, PWA tags, icons, and navy blue theme color.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, start URL, and navy blue theme color.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router setup creating routes, layout, error boundaries, and page components.
frontend/src/components/admin/assistant/: Admin tool for viewing, creating, editing, toggling, and deleting assistant knowledge base entries with dialog-driven forms.
Admin interface for viewing unanswered questions and converting them into knowledge base entries via a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/admin/Marketplac: Admin dashboard component that fetches and displays marketplace roadmap items with progress, error states, and a manual refresh action.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Admin interface for listing users, filtering, and assigning roles through dialogs with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Implements a chat interface with mode selection, message handling, and async assistant responses with error fallback.
Provides a floating toggleable widget that opens the AssistantChatPanel inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Global layout with header, navigation, auth controls, mobile drawer, promo banner, and assistant widget.
frontend/src/components/privacy/CookieCo: Displays a cookie consent banner with accept/reject options and navigation to the privacy policy.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for capturing full name and email and saving a user profile via mutation with validation and feedback toasts.
frontend/src/components/RouterErrorScree: Displays a generic routing error screen with a message and a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows an error screen with details and a page refresh option.
frontend/src/components/security/HumanCh: Renders a human verification dialog with a checkbox and math challenge before allowing continuation.
frontend/src/components/startup/Activiti: Shows a workflow of user activities with progress tracking and the ability to mark tasks complete.
frontend/src/components/startup/Business: Displays business credit progress and allows updating verification status with visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/startup/ClassesL: Lists lessons with progress tracking and supports viewing detailed lesson content.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Displays a lesson’s title, description, video, HTML content, and provides navigation and completion buttons.
frontend/src/components/startup/VirtualM: Fetches and lists upcoming and past virtual meetings with join buttons and status indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistant.ts: Provides a mutation hook that sends user questions to the backend assistant actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains numerous React Query hooks for admin actions, user profile stubs, and data fetching using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and custom animations and text styles.
frontend/src/lib/cookieConsent.ts: Handles storing, retrieving, and checking cookie consent status in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/humanCheck.ts: Implements a session-based human verification flag with expiration handling.
frontend/src/lib/pricingCopy.ts: Provides centralized pricing details and descriptive copy for marketplace and store‑builder plans.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard handling authentication, tab navigation, and admin actions like Stripe setup and access control initialization.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Displays affiliate metrics and milestones with placeholder data, requiring login and noting pending backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/AppCenterPage.tsx: Manages listing, creating, editing, and deleting app integrations with dialogs, forms, and backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AppLaunchPage.tsx: Launches partner apps in an iframe or new tab, validating authentication and the presence of a target URL.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDashboard5: Provides a scheduling interface embedding a Calendly iframe with links for booking ANC Apprentice Program appointments.
frontend/src/pages/B2BDashboard.tsx: Shows B2B dashboard cards and links, restricting access to authenticated users with the b2bMember role.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlog.tsx: Displays a grid of blog post previews with categories, dates, excerpts, and navigation to full posts.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlogPost.tsx: Renders the full content of an individual blog post based on the URL parameter.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFAQ.tsx: Shows a structured FAQ list with answers, including pricing details pulled from PRICING_MODEL.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFavoritesPage: Displays and manages a logged-in user's favorite sellers, with loading, error, and removal functionality.
Provides a placeholder inbox for customer messages, requiring login and noting messaging is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfileHome.t: Serves as the main customer dashboard with quick links to store features and account management.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPurchaseHisto: Displays a purchase history page with login gating and a placeholder for future order tracking features.
Provides user settings sections gated by login, with placeholders for profile, privacy, notifications, and account options.
Shows the user's wishlist with login gating, fetches items, handles removal, and displays loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/FunnelsPage.tsx: Manages marketing funnel partner configuration with login gating, admin checks, form editing, and external link handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, branding, and feature cards linking to store-related services.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Processes payment success logic, updates subscriptions, handles errors, and redirects after confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/PciCompliancePage.tsx: Displays PCI compliance details with certificate preview and provides buttons to view or download the certificate.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page with scrollable detailed sections outlining data practices and policies.
frontend/src/pages/SellersBusinessesBlog: Shows a grid of blog posts for sellers and businesses with categories, summaries, and navigation to full posts.
Loads and displays full content for an individual seller/business blog post based on the post ID.
Provides an FAQ page for sellers and businesses using accordion components to show questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Renders the Startup Program dashboard with membership checks and tabbed sections for lessons, meetings, activities, and business credit.
frontend/src/pages/StoreBuilderPage.tsx: Displays Store Builder subscription status, templates, and checkout flow with authentication and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Shows marketplace products, handles human-check-verified checkout, and manages purchase flow with user authentication.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines frontend TypeScript types for users, products, orders, startup program content, integrations, and store builder configuration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, layout, animations, and plugins for the project’s UI styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and tracking info for theme color updates.
